test.description: Test that viewer has the basic capability to render X11colors, using any of the equivalent forms.

test.title: coords-units-01-b
test.description: This test validates the processing rules for converting coordinates and length defined in fractions of the current object's bounding box to user space coordinates and length. Note that this test assumes that linear and radial gradients, as well as patterns are implemented.

test.title: coords-units-02-b
test.description: This test validates the processing rules for converting coordinates and length in CSS units to user space coordinate values.

test.title: coords-units-03-b
test.description: Validates simple initial viewport size and basic units handling.

test.title: coords-viewattr-01-b
test.comment: Slice is not yet supported.

test.comment: Slice is not yet supported.
test.description: Validates viewBox specification and the preserveAspectRatio attribute

test.title: coords-viewattr-03-b
test.description: Tests the viewBox attribute on SVG elements

test.description: Examples of feBlend operations

test.title: filters-light-01-f

test.title: filters-morph-01-f

test.title: filters-specular-01-f
test.description: Validates operation of the feSpecularLighting filter

test.title: filters-tile-01-b
test.description: Test that the viewer can handle the feTile filter.

test.title: filters-turb-01-f
test.description: Test which verifies the basic facilities of feTurbulence.

test.description: Test that viewer has the basic capability to handle the cursorproperty and cursor element

test.title: interact-dom-01-b
test.description: Checks if DOM/ECMA Script binding is supported. Checks that the DOM API supports event listener registration/unregistration.

test.title: interact-events-01-b
test.description: Test 'onload' event attribute.

test.title: interact-order-01-b
test.description: Test event bubbling of event attributes.

test.title: interact-order-02-b
test.description: Test event bubbling of event attributes.

test.title: interact-order-03-b
test.description: Test event bubbling of event attributes.

test.title: linking-a-01-b
test.description: Basic in-bound link object addressing formats.

test.title: linking-a-02-b
test.description: Basic in-bound link object addressing formats.

test.title: linking-a-03-b
test.description: Basic in-bound link object addressing formats.

test.title: linking-a-04-t
test.description: Verify basic out-bound links and the 'a' element.

test.title: linking-a-05-t
test.description: Verify transform attributes in the 'a' element.

test.title: linking-a-07-t
test.description: Verifyuse of xlink attributes on the 'a' element.

test.title: linking-uri-01-b
test.description: Link test of the 'view' element and its attributes, 1 of 2, internal.

test.title: linking-uri-02-b
test.description: Link test of the 'view' element and its attributes, 2 of 2, external.

test.title: linking-uri-03-t
test.description: Verify xlink attributes on the 'a' element.

test.title: masking-mask-04-f
test.comment: Only opacity masking is supported. Alpha composition will require a effect, but only BitmapEffect can be used for this, a WPF limitation.
test.description: Tests the impact of strokes within clipPath and mask

test.title: masking-mask-01-b
test.comment: SVG Font is not supported yet.
test.description: Test to see if the masking features using the mask element and mask property are available.

test.title: masking-opacity-01-b
test.description: Test to see the effect of applying an opacity property to a group.

test.title: masking-path-02-b
test.description: Test to see if clipPathUnits attribute is handled properly on a clipPath element. Only tests the userSpaceOnUse and objectBoundingBox items of the clipPathUnits. userSpace has been tested by the previous test as it is the default.

test.title: masking-path-03-b
test.description: Test 'overflow'/'clip' on outermost and inner 'svg' elements.

test.title: masking-path-04-b
test.description: Check that user-specified (non-default) clipPaths work.

test.title: masking-path-05-f
test.description: Test to see if clip-rule property has been implemented properly.

test.title: extend-namespace-01-f
test.comment: Scripting is not supported yet.
test.description: Test the use of multiple namespaces.

test.title: metadata-example-01-b
test.description: Verify that the viewer is not perturbed by the presence of metadata.

test.title: pservers-grad-01-b
test.description: Test that the viewer can handle the xlink:href attribute on linear, radial gradients and patterns.

test.title: pservers-grad-02-b
test.description: Test that the viewer can handle the xlink:href attribute on linear, radial gradients and patterns.

test.title: pservers-grad-03-b
test.description: Test that the viewer can handle the xlink:href attribute on patterns.

test.title: pservers-grad-04-b
test.description: Test that checks the capability of the stop element in linear and radial gradients.

test.title: pservers-grad-05-b
test.description: Test that checks the capability of the stop opacity in linear and radial gradients.

test.title: pservers-grad-06-b
test.description: Test that the viewer can handle the gradientTransform and the patternTransform attribute on gradients and patterns respectively.

test.title: pservers-grad-07-b
test.description: Test that the viewer has basic capability to handle linear gradients on fills and stroke of objects . This means it needs to understand the following elements : <linearGradient>, <stop> and the following properties : stop-color, fill:url(# ), stroke(url# )

test.title: pservers-grad-08-b
test.comment: The SVG Font is not supported.
test.description: Test that the viewer has basic capability to handle linear gradients on fills and stroke of objects and text. This means it needs to understand the following elements : <linearGradient>, <stop> and the following properties : stop-color, fill:url(# ), stroke(url# )

test.title: pservers-grad-09-b
test.description: Test that the viewer can handle the gradientUnits attribute on linear gradients.

test.title: pservers-grad-10-b
test.description: Test that the viewer can handle the spreadMethod attribute on linear gradients.

test.title: pservers-grad-11-b
test.comment: The linear gradient support is not complete, and the SVG Font is not supported.
test.description: Test that the viewer has basic capability to handle radial gradients on fills and stroke of objects and text. This means it needs to understand the following elements : <radialGradient>, <stop> and the following properties : stop-color, fill:url(# ), stroke(url# )

test.title: pservers-grad-12-b
test.description: Test that the viewer can handle the gradientUnits attribute on radial gradients.

test.title: pservers-grad-15-b
test.description: Tests the radial gradient focal point

test.title: pservers-grad-16-b
test.description: Tests the spreadMethod attributes for gradients

test.title: pservers-grad-19-b
test.comment: The animateColor element is not supported.

test.title: pservers-pattern-01-b
test.description: Test that the viewer has basic capability to handle patterns on fills and stroke of objects and text.

test.description: Test that viewer has the basic capability to handle the <fill,fill-rule,fill-opacity properites>

test.title: painting-fill-02-t

test.title: painting-fill-04-t
test.description: Test inheritance of painting properties.

test.title: painting-marker-01-f
test.description: Checks if viewer can handle marker elements on paths

test.title: painting-marker-02-f
test.description: Examines rendering model for markers

test.title: painting-marker-03-f
test.description: Tests the 'marker' shorthand property and the three marker presentation attributes

test.title: painting-render-01-b
test.description: Test color interpolation property.

test.title: painting-stroke-01-t
test.description: Test that viewer has the basic capability to handle the <stroke properites>

test.title: painting-stroke-02-t
test.description: Test that viewer has the basic capability to handle the <stroke properites>

test.title: painting-stroke-03-t
test.comment: WPF support for miter limit is different. The current solution is hacked and requires more testing.
test.description: Test that viewer has the basic capability to handle the <stroke properties>

test.title: painting-stroke-04-t
test.description: Test that viewer has the basic capability to handle the <stroke,stroke-opacity properites>

test.title: painting-stroke-07-t
test.comment: WPF support for miter limit is different. The current solution is hacked and requires more testing.

test.title: paths-data-01-t
test.description: Test that the viewer has the basic capability to handle the 'path' element and data (d) attribute in combination with the cubic Bezier curveto, both regular and shorthand/smooth forms - C, c, S, s (along with Mm and Zz).

test.title: paths-data-02-t
test.description: Test that the viewer has the basic capability to handle the 'path' element and data (d) attribute in combination with the quadratic Bezier curveto commands, both regular and shorthand/smooth forms - Q, q, T, t (along with Mm and Zz).

test.title: paths-data-03-f
test.description: Test that the viewer has the basic capability to handle the 'path' element and data (d) attribute in combination with the elliptical Arc curveto commands - A, a (along with Mm and Zz).

test.title: paths-data-04-t
test.description: Test that viewer has the basic capability to handle the <path> element and data (d) attribute in combination with the moveto, lineto, and closepath commands - M, L, Z, m, l, and z.

test.title: paths-data-05-t
test.description: Test that viewer has the basic capability to handle the <path> element and data (d) attribute in combination with the moveto, lineto, and closepath commands - M, L, Z, m, l, and z.

test.title: paths-data-06-t
test.description: Test that viewer has the basic capability to handle the <path> element and data (d) attribute in combination with the moveto, lineto, and closepath commands - M, L, Z, m, l, and z.

test.title: paths-data-07-t
test.description: Test that viewer has the basic capability to handle the <path> element and data (d) attribute in combination with the moveto, lineto, and closepath commands - M, L, Z, m, l, and z.

test.title: paths-data-08-t
test.description: Test that viewer has the basic capability to handle the <path> element and data (d) attribute in combination with the moveto and closepath commands - M and Z.

test.title: paths-data-09-t
test.description: Test that viewer has the basic capability to handle the <path> element and data (d) attribute in combination with the moveto and closepath commands - m and z.

test.title: paths-data-10-t
test.description: Test that viewer correctly handles the stroking of open and closed <path> elements

test.description: This test validates that shapes can be both filled.

test.title: render-elems-02-t

test.title: script-handle-04-b

test.title: shapes-ellipse-01-t
test.description: Test that viewer has the basic capability to handle the <ellipse> element.

test.title: shapes-rect-01-t

test.description: Test to determine if a simple switch element can be probably evaluated.

test.title: struct-cond-02-t
test.description: Test that viewer has the basic capability to switch on user langauge

test.title: struct-cond-03-t

test.description: Test to determine if the defs element is used as a container correctly

test.title: struct-image-01-t
test.description: Test that the jpg and png image formats are understood.

test.description: The purpose of this test so it test all the structure elements referenced in chapter 6 in one test file

test.title: struct-image-03-t
test.description: Test gamma correction of PNG images based on gAMA chunk. Derived from original HTML test by Dave Martindale.

test.title: struct-image-04-t
test.description: Test that jpg and png image formats are understood when inlined with the data: URI scheme.

test.title: struct-image-05-b
test.description: Test that the svg image format is understood.

test.title: struct-image-06-t
test.description: Tests proper handling of preserveAspectRatioattributes on the <image> element

test.title: struct-image-07-t
test.description: Tests proper handling of preserveAspectRatioattributes on the <image> element

test.title: struct-symbol-01-b
test.description: Test the creation of symbol elements and the instantiation by the use element

test.title: struct-use-01-t
test.description: Test that viewer has the basic capability to handle different font sizes

test.title: struct-use-03-t
test.description: Tests proper handling of x/y/width/height attributes on the <use> element

test.title: struct-use-05-b
test.description: Tests external references and computed inherited values

test.title: styling-css-01-b
test.comment: Text whitespace handling is not complete, not really part of this test, but must be considered too.
test.description: Test that viewer handles combinations of the simple CSS2 selectors: ancestor, child, sibling.

test.title: styling-css-02-b
test.description: Test that viewer handles combinations of the simple CSS2 selectors: ancestor, child, sibling.

test.comment: Text whitespace handling is not complete, not really part of this test, but must be considered too.

test.comment: Review the use of invalid and default values.
